entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
